item.title: How This Site Made and Site Generators
item.description: The older I become, the less I search for maximum cool solutions. Some solutions should be just good enough, even if far from perfect. For web site like a blog or personal page Wordpress or another CMS with dynamic content generation is just not needed. Also, it is good not to pay when you can (there is always a better place to use your money than amazon or your domestic hosting provider).
